From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He saw his optics hit.

"Yes!"

He was then hit by several of the energy blasts, before rolling out of
the line of fire

"Whats the matter? You cant fight fare? To afraid that I'm going to
grind you up into so many pieces they wont be able to repair you!"

He fired a missile at both Firestarter and Unitron. He then followed up
with two plasma blasts at both.
